Title: Revives causes of action for denial of retroactive membership by public retirement systems for members who would have qualified for such relief under section 803
Summary: Revives causes of action for denial of retroactive membership by public retirement systems for members who took all steps necessary to qualify for and would have qualified for such relief under section 803 of the retirement and social security law but for expiration of the time to bring a lawsuit, if suit is commenced on or before June 30, 2020.
ActClause: AN ACT to revive causes of action for the relief provided by section 803 of the retirement and social security law for members who previously took all steps necessary to obtain relief under such section but were denied such relief
